text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS FX705GM-NH74 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG!

Good for AAA gaming, but the battery life could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
